hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al- Hasan from Samurah, who said:"The Messenger of Allah said;" Two traders have the choice as long as they have not separated, or until they reach a deal that suits both of th4em or that is satisfactory (to both)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ دِينَارٍ فِي لَفْظِ هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From 'Abdullah bin Dinar
